channel.title: Pali 508 Skillcape help
channel.description:
So I have skillcapes all worked out, the only problem is no matter what level you are, you can equip it.
Example: Someone makes an account, then they buy a skillcape. They're able to wear it but not do the emote.
I want to make it so they cannot equip the skillcape until level 99 How do I fix this? D:
